content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created during these execution steps. Multiple attempts were made to place a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5), but failures due to insufficient inventory and unmet crafting prerequisites prevented a Lab from appearing on the map. Although existing furnaces (e.g. one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) were referenced for smelting operations, none of these were constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API parameter errors for get_entities:
 – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments such as “radius.”
 – Ensure that the proper number and type of arguments are provided according to the API specification.
 – When the function may return None, use a fallback (e.g. an empty list) before iterating.

• Lab placement and crafting issues:
 – Confirm that a Lab item exists in inventory before attempting to place it.
 – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable, and copper-plate) are available and that the necessary smelting or crafting facilities are in place.
 – Review the production chain and resource availability so that cascading shortages do not block lab crafting.

• General resource management:
 – Before triggering smelting or crafting operations, ensure that sufficient raw materials (iron-ore, copper-ore, coal, etc.) are available to support the required production processes.
